resources.string: Hey Annie. My boss Sheri asked me to call you Jujush. Kiwooth name I must say. You\'d be glad to know that I\'ve been reprogrammed to be self destroyed on your command. By hitting the button below, the \'self destroy\' command will be activated. Which will kill me forever tagged with a permanent database wipe out. Nervous? Dont worry I\'m not a living creature alhamdulillah.
